item.title: StanChart 在印度招聘新员工，加强私人信贷业务
item.description: 渣打银行全球银行业务主管 Henrik Raber 表示，渣打银行正在印度招聘三名新员工，以加强其私人信贷业务。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is bolstering its private credit business with three new hires in India, said Henrik Raber, global head of global banking.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "二次关税 "威胁发明了新的贸易武器
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一似乎发明了一种新的经济国策武器，他威胁要对从委内瑞拉购买石油的国家征收所谓的 "二级关税"，以切断委内瑞拉与其他国家的石油贸易。【原文：President Donald Trump appeared to invent a new weapon of economic statecraft on Monday by threatening what he dubbed “secondary tariffs” on countries that buy oil from Venezuela to choke off its oil trade with other nations.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴蔡崇信警告人工智能数据中心建设存在 "泡沫
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.阿里巴巴集团主席蔡崇信警告说，数据中心建设可能会形成泡沫，认为建设速度可能会超过人工智能服务的初期需求。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. Chairman Joe Tsai warned of a potential bubble forming in datacenter construction, arguing that the pace of that buildout may outstrip initial demand for AI services.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 坚守特斯拉，预测股价将达到 2,600 美元
item.description: Cathie Wood's Ark Investment Management LLC 依然看好特斯拉公司，并预计该股将在五年内达到 2,600 美元，几乎是目前价格的 10 倍。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management LLC remains bullish on Tesla Inc. and expects the stock will hit $2,600 in five years, or almost 10 times its current price.】

item.title: 日本任命内田和人为养老基金新负责人
item.description: 据日本卫生部称，日本任命内田和人（Kazuto Uchida）为政府养老金投资基金负责人。【原文：Japan named Kazuto Uchida as the head of the Government Pension Investment Fund, according to the the nation’s health ministry.】

item.title: 三星电子称联席首席执行官韩钟熙去世，享年 63 岁
item.description: 三星电子公司发言人周二通过电话表示，该公司联席首席执行官韩钟熙已经去世。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. co-Chief Executive Officer Han Jong-Hee has died, a spokesperson for the company said by phone on Tuesday.】

item.title: 市场消化特朗普关税言论，黄金稳定在历史高位附近
item.description: 黄金持稳，此前连续三天下跌，市场正在消化唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税威胁。【原文：Gold was steady — following a three-day run of losses — with the market digesting President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats.】

item.title: 游说团体称，只要采取正确措施，英国就能满足一半的石油和天然气需求
item.description: 据行业游说团体称，如果政策得当，到 2050 年，英国一半的石油和天然气消耗量可由国内供应。【原文：The UK could supply half of its oil and gas consumption from domestic sources by 2050 if the right policies were in place, according to the industry lobby group.】

item.title: 英国监管机构为实现增长减少大量过时法规
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）周二表示，英国金融公司可以不再遵循 100 多页关于抵押贷款和投资等产品的过时指南，这也是该局努力削减阻碍发展的监管障碍的一部分。【原文：British finance firms can stop following more than 100 pages of outdated guidance on products such as mortgages and investments, the Financial Conduct Authority said on Tuesday as part of its bid to slash regulatory barriers to growth.】

item.title: 印度为世界最大威士忌市场应对美国关税做好准备
item.description: Radico Khaitan 有限公司自 1943 年起就在其兰普尔蒸馏厂为印度人生产酒类，比印度独立早了四年。【原文：Radico Khaitan Ltd. has been producing alcohol for Indian drinkers at its Rampur distillery since 1943 — four years before the nation gained its independence.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Jon Gray 警告不要对关税做出膝撞式反应
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.总裁乔恩-格雷（Jon Gray）警告投资者不要围绕唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税大戏做出仓促决定，而应等待基本谈判的结果。【原文：Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray warned investors against making knee-jerk decisions around President Donald Trump’s tariff drama and instead advised waiting to see how the underlying negotiations play out.】

item.title: 中国钢铁市场仍受制于黯淡的房地产数据
item.description: 尽管整体经济出现复苏迹象，且建筑行业需求旺季即将来临，但中国钢材价格仍萎靡不振。【原文：Chinese steel prices are languishing, despite signs of resilience in the wider economy and the approach of peak demand season in the building industry.】

item.title: 贡渥集团交易主管在 "世代交替 "中离职
item.description: 贡渥集团交易主管 Stephane Degenne 即将离开公司，这是能源交易商高层更广泛转型的一部分。【原文：Gunvor Group head of trading Stephane Degenne is leaving the company as part of a wider transition in the energy trader’s top ranks.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言对委内瑞拉原油买家征收关税，石油保持涨势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要惩罚任何从委内瑞拉购买原油的国家，引发了人们对全球供应可能收紧的担忧，此后原油保持涨势。【原文：Oil held a run gains after President Donald Trump threatened to punish any nation purchasing crude from Venezuela, raising concerns over the potential for tightening global supply.】

item.title: 星链》能否最终攻克印度？谁将获益？
item.description: 3 月中旬，印度两大电信运营商分别与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空飞行公司 SpaceX 签订了协议，此举可能意味着马斯克的卫星互联网络 Starlink 距离进入这个拥有 14.4 亿人口的南亚国家又近了一步。【原文：India’s two major telecom operators signed separate deals with Elon Musk’s spaceflight company SpaceX in mid-March in a move that could signal his satellite internet network Starlink is one step closer to gaining entry to the South Asian country and its population of some 1.44 billion people.】

item.title: 托运人和钢铁制造商就特朗普对中国船只征税问题发生争执
item.description: 周一，美国立法者、工会和钢铁制造商与航运公司和农场出口商就特朗普政府向停靠美国的中国籍船只征收数百万美元税款的提议发生了争执。【原文：US lawmakers, labor unions and steel manufacturers were at odds with shipping companies and farm exporters Monday over a Trump administration proposal to put million-dollar levies on China-linked ships docking in the US.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体与新加坡 Crypto.com 合作开发美国制造 ETF
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. plans to work with Crypto.com on a lineup of “Made-in-America” investments — an arrangement that puts the president’s social media company in business with a Singapore-based firm that was locked in a legal battle with US regulators last year.】

item.title: 越南大亨开始上诉，努力偿还债券持有人的债务
item.description: 越南大亨张美兰（Truong My Lan）因洗钱等罪名被判处无期徒刑，周二将举行上诉听证会，她正努力偿还数亿银行赃款。【原文：Vietnamese tycoon Truong My Lan is working to pay back hundreds of millions in stolen bank funds as her appeal hearing against a life sentence for charges including money laundering gets underway Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因特朗普的关税信号而上涨：市场综述
item.description: 有迹象表明，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）实施的贸易制裁的范围将比人们担心的要小，受此推动，美国股市在今年以来表现最好的几个交易日之一中，亚洲股市普遍有望上涨。【原文：Asian stocks were broadly poised for gains after US equities enjoyed one of their best sessions of the year, fueled by signs that President Donald Trump’s trade sanctions will be narrower than feared.】

item.title: Ategrity Specialty Insurance 提交首次公开募股申请，显示销售额增长
item.description: 为美国中小型公司提供超额和剩余保险的 Ategrity Specialty Insurance Co.【原文：Ategrity Specialty Insurance Co., a provider of excess and surplus insurance to small- and mid-size US companies, filed for an initial public offering and disclosed growing revenue.】

item.title: 买入关税--降价是中国资深基金经理的口头禅
item.description: 美国一些最有经验的基金经理认为，唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日加征关税后，中国股市的任何回调都将是买入机会。【原文：Any pullback in Chinese stocks from Donald Trump’s April 2 tariffs would be a buying opportunity, according to some of the nation’s most experienced money managers.】

item.title: 贝恩称私募股权基金有望在亚洲开展更多交易活动
item.description: 据全球咨询公司贝恩公司（Bain & Co.）称，亚太地区的私募股权交易正呈现复苏迹象，去年该地区的交易额攀升了 11%，达到 1,760 亿美元，并有望进一步回升。【原文：Private equity deals in Asia Pacific are showing signs of recovery, with transaction volumes in the region climbing 11% to $176 billion last year and looking set to pick up further, according to global consultancy firm Bain & Co.】

item.title: 墨西哥公司寻求银行支持，37 亿美元押注数字城市和化肥领域
item.description: 费尔马卡全球公司（Fermaca Global）已与多家银行达成合作意向，帮助启动一项耗资 37 亿美元的宏伟计划，在墨西哥北部杜兰戈州建设数据基础设施和一家化肥厂。【原文：Fermaca Global has lined up banks to help kickstart an ambitious $3.7 billion plan to build data infrastructure and a fertilizer plant in the northern Mexican state of Durango.】

item.title: 特朗普的一位重要经济顾问如何看待关税问题
item.description:
今天的《华盛顿大视野》：特朗普的白宫经济顾问委员会新任主席解释了他对关税、削弱美元等问题的看法。【原文：

Today on the Big Take DC: Trump’s new Chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisers explains his views on tariffs, weakening the dollar and more.

】

item.title: EToro 集团提交首次公开募股申请，显示去年收入增长三倍
item.description: EToro Group Ltd. 提交了首次公开募股申请，披露了去年飙升的收入和净利润。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. filed for an initial public offering, disclosing revenue and net income that soared last year.】

item.title: 殖民地管道公司回应反对管道变更的抗议活动
item.description: 在石油巨头埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）以及大宗商品交易商 Trafigura 提出反对意见后，Colonial 管道公司为其燃料网络的运营变革提案进行了辩护。【原文：Colonial Pipeline Co. defended a proposal for operational changes on its fuel network after objections from oil majors Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. and commodities trader Trafigura.】

item.title: 谷歌正在寻找 ChatGPT 的答案
item.description:
互联网上最受欢迎的产品正在发生巨大的变化，Google（和网络）可能从此面目全非。【原文：

Big changes are underway for the internet’s most popular product, and Google (and the web) may never be the same.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称下行风险大于上行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，欧元区经济预测面临的下行风险大于上行风险。【原文：Risks to euro-zone economic forecasts are more to the downside than the upside, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva.】

item.title: 美国电力公司发行 20 亿美元股票
item.description: 美国电力公司正在发行 20 亿美元的普通股。【原文：American Electric Power Co. is offering $2 billion in shares of its common stock.】

item.title: 土耳其财政部长将在连日市场疲软后召开投资者电话会议
item.description: 土耳其财政部长穆罕默德-西姆塞克（Mehmet Simsek）将于周二与国际投资者举行电话会议，熟悉内情的人士称，在一位重要反对派人士被捕引发的动荡局势持续数日之后，土耳其当局正试图安抚市场。【原文：Turkey’s Finance Minister Mehmet Simsek will hold a call with international investors on Tuesday, people familiar with the matter said, as authorities seek to calm markets following days of turbulence triggered by the arrest of a key opposition figure.】
